subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Danny Granger had 26 points and 9 rebounds and Roy Hibbert added 18 points and 10 rebounds as Indiana beat Orlando, 97-74, in Game 3.
snippet: Danny Granger had 26 points and 9 rebounds and Roy Hibbert added 18 points and 10 rebounds as Indiana beat Orlando, 97-74, in Game 3.
